title: Around the clock in Europe;
author: Howell, Charles Fish.
snippet: Across the Serpentine in the children's paradise of Kensington Gardens we should find that the Board Walk and the "Round Pond" lose none of their drawing- power with the years and that the fountains and flowers  are as beautiful and as highly prized as ever. There is the additional attraction of having a chance, by keeping  a sharp eye on the tops of the tall ash-trees, of catching  a glimpse of Peter Pan preparing to fly home to his mother's window.
